metadata.name: Pillars Of life
metadata.description:
Our life is like beautiful building which is stand on various pillars like family, friends,hobey, Arts,Spirituality And Beliefs and so many things  .So be the pillar in others life to support them,built them, motivate them and create beautiful place.


Artist: Sujal Shah

Location: Ahmedabad, India


Jama Masjid also known as Jumah Mosque or Jami' Masjid, is a mosque in Ahmedabad, and was built in 1424 during the reign of Ahmad Shah. The Jama Masjid of Ahmedabad was probably the largest mosque in the Indian subcontinent built in this period.
